queries.getConversations: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT 'OUT' AS dir, CM.MESSAGE_ID msgId, CM.CONVERSATION_ID cId, CM.USER_TO userId, U.USERNAME userName, IFNULL(U.AVATAR, 'avatar.png') avatar, CM.MESSAGE msg, CM.ESTATUS status, CM.CREATION_DATE creationDate FROM secopre.CHAT_CONVERSATION CC, secopre.CHAT_MESSAGE CM, secopre.USER U WHERE CC.USER_ID = ? AND CC.CONVERSATION_ID = CM.CONVERSATION_ID AND CM.CREATION_DATE = (SELECT MAX(CREATION_DATE) FROM secopre.CHAT_MESSAGE WHERE CONVERSATION_ID = CM.CONVERSATION_ID) AND CM.USER_FROM = CC.USER_ID AND CM.USER_TO = U.ID AND CM.ACTIVE = 1 UNION SELECT 'IN' AS dir, CM.MESSAGE_ID msgId, CM.CONVERSATION_ID cId, CM.USER_FROM userId, U.USERNAME userName, IFNULL(U.AVATAR, 'avatar.png') avatar, CM.MESSAGE msg, CM.ESTATUS status, CM.CREATION_DATE creationDate FROM secopre.CHAT_CONVERSATION CC, secopre.CHAT_MESSAGE CM, secopre.USER U WHERE CC.USER_ID = ? AND CC.CONVERSATION_ID = CM.CONVERSATION_ID AND CM.CREATION_DATE = (SELECT MAX(CREATION_DATE) FROM secopre.CHAT_MESSAGE WHERE CONVERSATION_ID = CM.CONVERSATION_ID) AND CM.USER_TO = CC.USER_ID AND CM.USER_FROM = U.ID AND CM.ACTIVE = 1 ) T ORDER BY T.creationDate DESC LIMIT ?,?
queries.updateSeen: UPDATE secopre.CHAT_MESSAGE SET ESTATUS = 1, LAST_UPDATE = SYSDATE() WHERE ESTATUS = 0 AND CONVERSATION_ID = ?
queries.getConversation: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT 'OUT' as direction, CM.USER_FROM userId, UF.USERNAME userName, IFNULL(UF.AVATAR, 'avatar.png') avatar, CM.MESSAGE msg, CM.ESTATUS status, CM.CREATION_DATE creationDate FROM secopre.CHAT_MESSAGE CM, secopre.USER UF WHERE CM.CONVERSATION_ID = ? AND CM.USER_FROM = UF.ID AND UF.ID = ? UNION SELECT 'IN' as direction, CM.USER_TO userId, UT.USERNAME userName, IFNULL(UT.AVATAR, 'avatar.png') avatar, CM.MESSAGE msg, CM.ESTATUS status, CM.CREATION_DATE creationDate FROM secopre.CHAT_MESSAGE CM, secopre.USER UT WHERE CM.CONVERSATION_ID = ? AND CM.USER_FROM = UT.ID AND CM.USER_TO = ? ) t ORDER BY t.creationDate DESC LIMIT ?, ?
queries.startUserConnection: INSERT INTO secopre.REL_USER_CONNECTION (USER_ID, SOCKET_ID, CREATION_DATE, LAST_UPDATE, ACTIVE) VALUES (?, ?, SYSDATE(), SYSDATE(), 1) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE SOCKET_ID = VALUES(SOCKET_ID), LAST_UPDATE = VALUES(LAST_UPDATE), ACTIVE = VALUES(ACTIVE)
queries.finishUserConnection: UPDATE secopre.REL_USER_CONNECTION SET LAST_UPDATE = SYSDATE(), ACTIVE = 0 WHERE SOCKET_ID = ?
queries.getFrecuentUsers: SELECT T.CONVERSATION_ID cId, T.USER_ID userId, T.USERNAME userName, IFNULL(T.AVATAR, 'avatar.png') avatar, CONVERT(T.ACTIVE, DECIMAL) online, T.LAST_UPDATE lastConnection, T.DESCRIPTION employment FROM ( SELECT COUNT(*) AS TOTAL, CC2.CONVERSATION_ID, CC2.USER_ID, U.USERNAME, U.AVATAR, RUC.ACTIVE, RUC.LAST_UPDATE, P.DESCRIPTION FROM secopre.CHAT_CONVERSATION CC1, secopre.CHAT_CONVERSATION CC2, secopre.USER U, secopre.CHAT_MESSAGE CM, secopre.REL_USER_CONNECTION RUC, secopre.POSITION P WHERE CC1.USER_ID = ? AND CC1.CONVERSATION_ID = CC2.CONVERSATION_ID AND CC2.USER_ID <> CC1.USER_ID AND CC2.USER_ID = U.ID AND CC2.CONVERSATION_ID = CM.CONVERSATION_ID AND RUC.USER_ID = CC2.USER_ID AND RUC.USER_ID = U.ID AND U.POSITION_ID = P.ID GROUP BY CM.CONVERSATION_ID ) T ORDER BY T.TOTAL DESC, T.USER_ID ASC LIMIT 5
queries.getActiveUsers: SELECT U.ID userId, U.USERNAME userName, IFNULL(U.AVATAR, 'avatar.png') avatar, P.DESCRIPTION employment, CC.CONVERSATION_ID cId FROM secopre.REL_USER_CONNECTION RUC, secopre.USER U, secopre.CHAT_CONVERSATION CC secopre.POSITION P WHERE RUC.SOCKET_ID = ? AND RUC.USER_ID != ? AND RUC.USER_ID = U.ID AND U.POSITION_ID = P.ID AND CC.USER_ID = RUC.USER_ID AND CC.CONVERSATION_ID IN (SELECT CONVERSATION_ID FROM secopre.CHAT_CONVERSATION WHERE USER_ID = ?)
queries.getActiveUsersV2: SELECT U.ID userId, U.USERNAME userName, IFNULL(U.AVATAR, 'avatar.png') avatar, P.DESCRIPTION employment, IFNULL(( SELECT T1.CONVERSATION_ID FROM secopre.CHAT_CONVERSATION T1 WHERE T1.USER_ID = RUC.USER_ID AND T1.CONVERSATION_ID IN (SELECT T2.CONVERSATION_ID FROM secopre.CHAT_CONVERSATION T2 WHERE T2.USER_ID = ?) ),-1) cId FROM secopre.REL_USER_CONNECTION RUC, secopre.USER U, secopre.POSITION P WHERE RUC.SOCKET_ID = ? AND RUC.USER_ID != ? AND RUC.USER_ID = U.ID AND U.POSITION_ID = P.ID
queries.getUser: SELECT U.ID userId, U.USERNAME userName, IFNULL(U.AVATAR, 'avatar.png') avatar, P.DESCRIPTION employment FROM secopre.USER U, secopre.POSITION P WHERE U.ID = ? AND U.POSITION_ID = P.ID
queries.existConversation: SELECT IFNULL( (SELECT CC.CONVERSATION_ID cId FROM secopre.CHAT_CONVERSATION CC WHERE CC.USER_ID = ? AND CC.CONVERSATION_ID IN (SELECT C2.CONVERSATION_ID FROM secopre.CHAT_CONVERSATION C2 WHERE C2.USER_ID = ?) ), -1) cId
queries.isUserOnline: SELECT CONVERT(RUC.ACTIVE, DECIMAL) active, RUC.SOCKET_ID socketId FROM secopre.REL_USER_CONNECTION RUC WHERE RUC.USER_ID = ?
queries.insertMessage: INSERT INTO secopre.CHAT_MESSAGE (CONVERSATION_ID, USER_FROM, USER_TO, MESSAGE, ESTATUS, CREATION_DATE) VALUES (?,?,?,?,0,SYSDATE());
queries.getUserInfo: SELECT U.ID userId, U.USERNAME userName, IFNULL(U.AVATAR, 'avatar.png') avatar, P.DESCRIPTION employment, IFNULL(( SELECT T1.CONVERSATION_ID FROM secopre.CHAT_CONVERSATION T1 WHERE T1.USER_ID = RUC.USER_ID AND T1.CONVERSATION_ID IN (SELECT T2.CONVERSATION_ID FROM secopre.CHAT_CONVERSATION T2 WHERE T2.USER_ID = ?) ),-1) cId, CONVERT(RUC.ACTIVE, DECIMAL) online, RUC.LAST_UPDATE lastConnection FROM secopre.REL_USER_CONNECTION RUC, secopre.USER U, secopre.POSITION P WHERE UPPER(U.USERNAME) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT('%', ?, '%')) AND U.ID != ? AND RUC.USER_ID = U.ID AND U.POSITION_ID = P.ID
